mi:PackageInformation.name: Composite.Media.ImageGallery.Flickr
mi:PackageInformation.author: Composite A/S
mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: To show a full-size image from a Flickr album in a light box on your website, we recommend that you install Composite.Media.ImageGallery.Slimbox2.
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Displays photos from Flickr's photostreams, favorites, photo sets on your website.
